basics.label: Business Development Manager
basics.summary: Resourceful and self directed business development manager. Defined and executed strategies and operations while leading collaborative full project cycles with National and Local Governments across Southern Africa.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed strategic and operational relationships across 3 Foreign Governments. Exceeded targeted sales goals by $24m USD. Generated new accounts by implementing effective networking and content marketing strategies.
highlights: Generated a pipeline of more than $20m in net new opportunities in 12 months.
Spearheaded company-wide prospecting, closing and project management endeavors for entire SADC region.
Established 3 new corporate accounts averaging $15m in sales.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Assisted financial director and other company leaders in due diligence and negotiations related to acquiring or disposing of assets.

work.summary: Identified strategic partnerships and gathered market information and other data to gain a competitive advantage.
